name: PBP Newsticker
author: projoktibangla

sections.description:
Create as many Newstickers as you want and display them using shortcodes, widgets or PHP.

Features

  • Create many tickers.
  • Choose skin from many skins.
  • Set ticker title.
  • Choose animation & Set animation settings.
  • Set tickers with Own News Item.
  • Set tickers by Most Recent Post.
  • Set tickers with Custom Post Type.
  • Set tickers by Recent Comments.
  • Create tickers with latest Tweets from Twitter.
  • Create tickers from latest RSS feeds.
  • Create tickers with latest Post from Facebook.
sections.installation:
Automatic

  • In the admin panel under plugins page, click Add New.
  • Go to Upload tab.
  • Browse “PBP Newsticker” and click install now.
  • Click Active plugin.
  • Go to Settings>PBP Newstickers and customize your settings.

Manual

  • Extract zip file to your wp-content/plugins directory.
  • In the admin panel under plugins, click active “PBP Newsticker”.
  • Go to Settings>PBP Newstickers and customize your settings.
sections.faq: Any problem, just mail us. email- projoktibangla@gmail.com
